Package Controller

Class RequestDeregisterDB

java.lang.Object
Controller.Database
Controller.RequestDeregisterDB
public class RequestDeregisterDB extends Database
Represents a Database of all Deregister Requests in FYP Management System.
Since:
2023-04-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lab A34 Assignment Team 1

      studentDB - Database of students in FYPMS.
      fypCoordDB - Database of FYP coordinators in FYPMS.
